description: DOMPurify is a DOM-only, super-fast, uber-tolerant XSS sanitizer for HTML, MathML and SVG. It's written in JavaScript and works in all modern browsers (Safari, Opera (15+), Internet Explorer (10+), Firefox and Chrome - as well as almost anything else using Blink or WebKit). DOMPurify is written by security people who have vast background in web attacks and XSS. Fear not.

name: dompurify

scripts.build: cross-env run-p build:umd build:umd:min build:es build:cjs
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=rollup rollup -c -f cjs -o dist/purify.cjs.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=rollup rollup -c -f es -o dist/purify.es.js
scripts.build:umd: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=rollup rollup -c -f umd -o dist/purify.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=rollup rollup -c -f umd -o dist/purify.min.js
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test BABEL_ENV=rollup npm run lint &&  npm run test:jsdom && npm run test:karma -- --browsers Chrome
scripts.test:ci: cross-env NODE_ENV=test BABEL_ENV=rollup npm run test:jsdom && npm run test:karma -- --log-level error --reporters dots --single-run --shouldTestOnBrowserStack="${TEST_BROWSERSTACK}" --shouldProbeOnly="${TEST_PROBE_ONLY}"
scripts.test:karma: cross-env NODE_ENV=test BABEL_ENV=rollup karma start test/karma.conf.js --log-level warn
